name: Windy Foothills
description: The land rises from the fertile farms into rolling, grassy hills dotted with rocky outcrops. Sheep graze on the slopes, watched over by solitary shepherds. The wind is a constant presence here.

grassy_slope.name: Grassy Slope
grassy_slope.description: A wide, open slope covered in tough grasses and heather, climbing steadily upwards from the farmlands. The wind is stronger here. You can see the apple orchards below to the northwest and the town walls to the west.

rocky_outcrop.name: Rocky Outcrop
rocky_outcrop.description: A cluster of large, weathered rocks juts from the hillside, offering some shelter from the wind. A narrow trail continues climbing to the north.

steep_trail.name: Steep Trail
steep_trail.description: The trail becomes steeper here, winding through a series of short switchbacks. The elevation is clearly increasing.

windy_ridge.name: Windy Ridge
windy_ridge.description: The top of the hill forms a long, windswept ridge. The view is expansive, showing the farmlands to the southwest and taller, more rugged peaks to the north.

mountain_pass_approach.name: Mountain Pass Approach
mountain_pass_approach.description: The grassy ridge gives way to a stony path that leads north into a narrow pass between two larger hills. This looks like the way to the high mountains.

high_meadow.name: High Meadow
high_meadow.description: A surprisingly sheltered meadow at a high elevation. Tough alpine flowers grow here, and a small cave opens into the hillside to the south.

hilltop_cave_entrance.name: Hilltop Cave Entrance
hilltop_cave_entrance.description: A small, dark opening is nestled into the side of the hill. A cool, damp draft emerges from within.

hilltop_cave.name: Hilltop Cave
hilltop_cave.description: A small, damp cave inside the hill. It doesn't seem to go very deep.

standing_stone.name: Standing Stone
standing_stone.description: A single, large monolith of grey stone stands here, covered in ancient, weathered carvings. A small spring bubbles up from its base.

shepherds_path.name: Shepherd's Path
shepherds_path.description: A narrow path, well-worn by boots and hooves, branches off from the main trail. It leads towards a small stone hut nestled into the hillside.

shepherds_hut.name: Shepherd's Hut
shepherds_hut.description: A small, simple hut made of stone and turf. A thin trail of smoke rises from a chimney hole. A fenced-in pen for sheep is attached to the north side.

sheep_pen.name: Sheep Pen
sheep_pen.description: A fenced area next to the shepherd's hut where sheep are kept at night. The ground is well-trodden and smells strongly of lanolin.
